desc: 1) The person who downloads the application will see a standard character after entering the "name, surname, age, height, weight" in the download phase.2) After the application is downloaded, the user will make selections for the standard character. With the option of "hair, skin color, eye color", the country, city, neighborhood and neighborhood can be selected clearly.3) The character will have a visual home, only one room will appear when the house is clicked (like living room). When the character is at home, specific tasks (statistics) for the player will be directed through boxes.4) The character will be the standard garment at the beginning of the game. (The character will either watch the video or pay to reach different clothes.)5) The character will earn points (money) in this activity which will take place in some activities.6) The user will act as life coach of the character and will give specific tasks for the character. (Making friends, Night Life, Work Life etc.)7) Some activities will be presented to the area according to the character to be acquired. If the character is arguing and aggressive, he will be able to join mafia groups in street battles own around.GAME PROCESS IS ABOVE.3D MODEL DRAWING GRAPHICS.1) The character.2) A house for the character and a living room in the house.3) Images for data that will be required in character selection. (like hair color, hair shape, eye color, skin color).4) City maps, night club, field carpet, concert areas, cafes for making friends, etc.5) A scene to show the "statistic" when the character enters for the house.6) If there is a graphic that is "missed" for the game I mentioned above, please contact with me.
title: 3D MODEL DRAWING GRAPHICS.

desc: SYNOPSIS OF THE PROJECT: Saleem is a story of human vulnerability and maliciousness, as it questions the notions of free will and human altruism. Saleem and Hamada—two Yemeni immigrants, close friends and roommates—struggle to contain themselves after an American drone hits Saleem’s house in Yemen.CHARACTERISTICS OF THE PROJECT- The director is Yousef Assabahi, a Yemeni-American film student from UCLA. The entire budget for the production is only $5000.- Only 4 production days. From Thursday, Nov. 30th to Sunday, Dec. 3rd.- The entire Production Design budget is only $800. We are aware that this is not a lot, and we offer to split the estimate into two equal parts, one as a salary ($100/day rate), and the rest, the project's costs.VERY TIME SENSITIVE.
